title: My son is showing up in my txt feed as my husband.
content: I got into the messages app, was trying to send txt to my son. Couldn't find our txts in the messages app. THere's actually 2 seperate entries under my husband (one of which is actually my son's string of txts) and I can't get it back to my sons contact info. Everything was fine this morning. Now this afternoon the contacts are crossing for lack of better words. Im not showing an updates available. I shut down my phone for over an hour, and started it back up, and nothing happened.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
